Articles.Content:
A ship I made quite a while before I learned how to fly properly.

Here it goes on a Gilly expedition:

(The big rocket was the middle section of the lifter, which had six more of them around it)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

They got home in the end...
Nice work! I did nearly the same thing today, but instead of going home I landed on eve!
An interesting LM design plan- picking it up with the return craft is quite precarious don't you think?
